function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Voice-based COVID-19 diagnosis app may not be accurate or reliable","Impact":"Misdiagnosis or false negatives could lead to further spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and testing of the app's accuracy and reliability before widespread use","Technologies":"Advanced algorithms for sound analysis and pattern recognition","People":"Individuals using the app for diagnosis","Owner":"Developers and researchers of the app"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing apps","Impact":"Potential abuse of privacy and data security breaches","Mitigation":"Stringent data protection measures, encryption, and independent privacy audits","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for decentralized data storage and encryption","People":"Users of contact tracing apps","Owner":"Developers and organizations behind the contact tracing apps"},{"Description":"Issues of accuracy and reliability in contact tracing apps","Impact":"Inaccurate data and unreliable contact tracing capabilities","Mitigation":"Continuous improvement and validation of algorithms, data validation, and feedback systems","Technologies":"Machine learning for pattern recognition and data analysis","People":"Users and public health authorities relying on contact tracing data","Owner":"Developers and organizations responsible for maintaining contact tracing apps"}]}
